message.body: Just curious is our internet working? Don't need it. But just curious.
No spent some time on the phone with comcast today they think it's the router
I've been trying to reset it, but no dice
Is there an Ethernet hookup on your laptop?
No but I have another laptop
No I meant if you really need to use internet you can hookup to the modem
(Thank you for doing this... Sorry today has just been jam packed for me)
Also Cassie figured out some wifi thing with an old login
You can get that info from her and wifi all night and day
Oh cool. Thank you. But I can live without for a few days (thank god with data) but just wanted to Know where we are on that front. And if I should do anything tomorrow
If I can't get this router going the next step is a new router/modem.
Apparently our modem is wayyy old school
Or I could take them both apart and use a fishhook and a gum wrapper to get them working again! I read how to do it online!! I'll send you a bajillion emails and make your life miserable
Actually my plan A is to have Charlie look at it
Omg I literally threw up in my mouth
